title: Vilas Adinath Sangave
content:
Vilas Adinath Sangave (2 June 1920 â€“ 1 March 2011) was an Indian sociologist and Jainologist. He was born to a Marathi Jain family in Solapur, Maharashtra. Sangave died at the age of 90.[1]
